name: Lightning Racing Cars
description:
Our friends Mac and Matte are planning to participate in a race! Come and join us in a cartoon adventure with our cars racing game made especially for kids!

Start driving with our funny friends Mac and Matte in this amazing cartoon cars racing game: Speed up, move fast, do not crash and, above all, have fun! This amazing game have the awesome landscape and graphics you wanted and intuitive mobile controls so you do not get bored!

The goal of this car game is clear: Drive your vehicle across the roads in a funny competition. Move strategically avoiding the cars so you do not crash in this driving game!

- Incredible cartoon cars in this friendly competition! Drive your favourite car and be the fastest in this racing game!
- Take bends at maximum speed! You cannot slow down!
- Intuitive and user-friendly game interface!
- This mission requires a lot of concentration during the race: Do not get distracted or you will crash!
- Share your highest score of the games with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and Google+!

This car racing game is especially designed for kids: Entertain yourself with your friends Mac and Matte in a funny car competition!
